title: MD, PhD
portraitUrl: data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><rect width="100" height="100" fill="%23300066"/><text x="50" y="50" font-family="serif" font-size="40" fill="%23FFD700" text-anchor="middle" dy=".3em">BL</text></svg>
bio: Bruce L. Miller is a pioneer in Behavioral Neurology at UC San Francisco, USA. With a D-Index of 202 and over 174,645 citations, they are among the world's most influential researchers.
